content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
April 29, 2019
NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:James Byrne, of Virginia, to be Deputy Secretary of Veterans Affairs, vice Thomas G. Bowman.Ann C. Fisher, of the District of Columbia, to be a Commissioner of the Postal Regulatory Commission for a term expiring October 14, 2024, vice Tony Hammond, term expired.
